Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory669.jpg'}
{3: 'Ayla raises her pen and aligns it with the girl in her vision.'}
{3: 'Ayla is no beginner. She should not need to spend so much time on perspective and proportion.'}
{1: '1', 2: '???', 3: 'Excuse me? How much longer will this take?', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Ayla', 3: "It won't take long. Hold on.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Ayla smiles and waves at the white-haired girl.'}
{3: 'Her pen quickly dances on the canvas afterward.'}
{1: '999', 2: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory0.png', 3: '0', 4: '1', 5: '2'}
{1: '1', 3: 'You take this moment to inspect the girl again.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory669.jpg'}
{3: 'After Ayla gained another victory a few minutes ago, you immediately noticed the girl amidst the chaos.'}
{3: 'You had no idea how long she had been standing there. Perhaps it was instinct, but you decided to interact with her.'}
{1: '1', 2: '???', 3: "I didn't join the fight because I don't really understand art...", 4: '1'}
{3: 'You were surprised by her answer, and you took out your terminal to go over the list of personnel currently stationed in Constellia again.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Ayla', 3: 'She is a mechanoid, Commandant.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Ayla looks at the girl curiously, her paintbrushes still in her arms.'}
{2: 'Like Cervantes?', 3: '29'}
{2: 'Ayla', 3: "Hmm... She doesn't feel like Cervantes, but I suppose there are similarities in a technical sense.", 4: '1'}
{3: "Meeting the girl's gaze, Ayla scratches her head apologetically."}
{2: 'Ayla', 3: 'Sorry for staring at you like that.', 4: '1'}
{2: '???', 3: "It's okay. I don't mind.", 4: '2'}
{3: 'The girl remained expressionless and calm.'}
{2: 'Ayla', 3: 'Hmm... Can I draw something for you as an apology, then?', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Which brings you back to the present.'}
{3: 'Ayla takes the drawing and flips it over, showing it to the girl.'}
{2: 'As expected from Ayla.', 3: '48'}
{2: 'It looks like a photo to me.', 3: '49'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Ayla', 3: 'Technically, yes.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Ayla seems dissatisfied with her work, despite what you said.'}
{2: 'Ayla', 3: "I would hate to look like I'm showing off, hehe...", 4: '1'}
{2: '???', 3: 'Why would you draw something like that when you could capture it with a visual sensor and reproduce it...?', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Mark hurriedly cuts off the girl, but she only looks at him with confusion as if genuinely seeking an answer.'}
{1: '1', 3: 'Mark peeks behind him, surprised to find Ayla unoffended.'}
{3: "On the contrary, Ayla's eyes are sparkling with joy."}
{2: 'Ayla', 3: "It's boring, isn't it?! I think so, too!", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Ayla puts the picture aside, grabs another piece of paper, and starts drawing again.'}
{3: 'It does not take her too long this time before she shows all of you a new drawing.'}
{3: 'The girl is en pointe on top of the windmill, dancing before a parade of hot air balloons, drones, and small hoverbots above Constellia.'}
{2: 'Ayla', 3: 'I added a little bit of imagination. Do you like it?', 4: '1'}
{2: '???', 3: "I don't know. What you drew is nearly impossible.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Ayla', 3: 'Which was why I had to draw it!', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Ayla', 3: "No one says we can't draw from our imagination, right?", 4: '1'}
{3: 'The girl considers what Ayla has said and comes up with a conclusion.'}
{2: '???', 3: "Is that what art is, then? Things that don't exist in our sensory records.", 4: '2'}
{3: "The girl's question catches Ayla off guard, but she just smiles and passes the girl her new drawing."}
{2: 'Ayla', 3: "Not entirely. That's just part of what art can be.", 4: '1'}
{3: "Confronted by Ayla's relentless smiles, the girl repeats what she said before."}
{2: '???', 3: "I don't really understand art...", 4: '2'}
{2: "We're investigating the mechanoids' obsession with art.", 3: '87'}
{2: 'Do you want to join us?', 3: '88'}
{3: 'Ayla quietly gives you a thumbs-up while the girl turns to look at you.'}
{2: 'Ayla', 3: 'Yeah! Nice to meet you!', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Ayla jumps up and hugs the girl before she can finish as if Ayla has anticipated her answer already.'}
{2: 'Ayla', 3: 'My name is Ayla. This is my commandant. And this is Mark the Great.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Mark', 3: "Mark. It's just Mark. Mark's not great at all.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Mark corrects Ayla while putting away his canvas secretly.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Ayla', 3: "And what's your name?", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Dulcinea', 3: 'Dulci... Dulcinea.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Dulcinea', 3: "That's what Cervantes named me.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Ayla', 3: 'Dulcinea, is it? I\'ll name this drawing "Dulcinea", then.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Ayla', 3: "It's... kind of a long name to pronounce, though. Can I call you Dulcy?", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Dulcinea', 3: 'Sure.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Ayla', 3: 'Nice to meet you, Dulcy!', 4: '1'}
